dialogue.zh:
Here 你 go—one seafood pasta.
Here あなた go—one seafood pasta.

dialogue.text: Oh, I think this isn’t mine.
dialogue.zh:
Oh, 我 think this isn’t mine.
Oh, 私 think this isn’t mine.

dialogue.text: Sorry about that. What did you order?
dialogue.zh:
Sorry about that. What did 你 點餐?
Sorry about that. What did あなた 注文?

我 ordered the mushroom pasta.
私 ordered the mushroom pasta.

Let me check. 你’re right.
Let me check. あなた’re right.

不 problem.
いいえ problem.

dialogue.text: Would you like me to replace it?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like me to replace it?
Would あなた like me to replace it?

是的, 請.
はい, お願いします.

It’ll take about eight minutes.
It’ll take about eight minutes.

That’s 好的.
That’s わかりました.

dialogue.text: Can I get you anything while you wait?
dialogue.zh:
可以 我 get 你 anything while 你 wait?
できます 私 get あなた anything while あなた wait?

Some 水, 請.
Some 水, お願いします.

當然. Still or sparkling?
もちろん. Still or sparkling?

Still 水.
Still 水.

Here 你 是.
Here あなた are.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

dialogue.text: I’m really sorry for the mix-up.
dialogue.zh:
我’m really sorry the mix-up.
私’m really sorry for the mix-up.

It’s 好的. It happens.
It’s わかりました. It happens.

dialogue.text: Do you want to keep this until the new one comes?
dialogue.zh:
你 想要 to keep this until the new one comes?
Do あなた want to keep this until the new one comes?

dialogue.text: No, you can take it back.
dialogue.zh:
不, 你 可以 take it back.
いいえ, あなた できます take it back.

dialogue.text: Got it. I’ll bring the correct dish soon.
dialogue.zh:
Got it. 我’ll bring the correct dish soon.
Got it. 私’ll bring the correct dish soon.

謝謝 你.
ありがとう あなた.

Here’s the mushroom pasta.
Here’s the mushroom pasta.

太好了, 謝謝.
いいですね, ありがとう.

Would 你 like extra cheese?
Would あなた like extra cheese?

是的, a little.
はい, a little.

dialogue.text: Anything else I can do for you?
dialogue.zh:
Anything else 我 可以 你?
Anything else 私 できます do for あなた?

不, 我’m good.
いいえ, 私’m good.

Enjoy!
Enjoy!

謝謝.
ありがとう.
